mapper.select: SELECT gu.id, gu.group_type, gu.group_id, gu.user_id, gu.joined_at, gu.is_creator FROM chat_room cr JOIN group_user gu ON cr.group_type = gu.group_type AND cr.group_id = gu.group_id WHERE cr.id = #{chatId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_user (group_type, group_id, user_id, is_creator) VALUES (#{groupType}, #{groupId}, #{userId}, #{isCreator})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM group_user WHERE id= #{chatId} AND user_id = #{userId}
